title: Alexander the Great
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 902 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 860L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     X and Z2
description: Alexander the Great was one of the most significant leaders the world has ever known. Readers will enjoy learning about his twelve years as king, and how he expanded his empire throughout the Middle East, Asia, and Egypt, sharing cultures and creating trade routes that would change the ancient world.
